caption:
This photograph presents a serene and picturesque view of a large, two-story white stucco house with a Spanish architectural style, featuring red tiled roofing. The house is framed by lush, green landscaping including various trees, palms, flowering shrubs, and a well-maintained garden.

In the foreground, there's a small pond overgrown with lily pads and bordered by ornamental grasses and bright red flowers. This natural setting provides a tranquil and aesthetically pleasing element to the scene.

At the center of the composition, two people are captured riding bicycles in a garden path located behind the pond. Their presence adds a dynamic and lively aspect to the scene, suggesting leisure and activity within this scenic environment.

The overcast sky suggests a soft, diffuse light over the entire scene, enhancing the vibrancy of the greenery and floral elements. The overall setup conveys a sense of peaceful coexistence between the elegant architecture and the flourishing nature surrounding it.
title: The Cloisterâ€”an expensive and exclusive resort on Sea Island
